Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing Shawn Houseman to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Relates to authorizing Shawn Houseman to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law for service with the Orleans county sheriff's office.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Shawn Houseman to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
